definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">package net.mcreator.cannon.procedures;&#10;&#10;import net.minecraft.world.level.Level;&#10;import net.minecraft.world.entity.decoration.ArmorStand;&#10;import net.minecraft.world.entity.EntityType;&#10;import net.minecraft.world.entity.Entity;&#10;import net.minecraft.core.BlockPos;&#10;&#10;public class SpawnRopeBetweenFencesProcedure {&#10;    public static void execute(Level world, BlockPos pos1, BlockPos pos2) {&#10;        if (world.isClientSide) return; // Only run on server&#10;&#10;        // Create first Armor Stand at the first fence&#10;        ArmorStand armorStand1 = new ArmorStand(EntityType.ARMOR_STAND, world);&#10;        armorStand1.setPos(pos1.getX() + 0.5, pos1.getY() + 1, pos1.getZ() + 0.5);&#10;        armorStand1.setInvisible(true);&#10;        armorStand1.setInvulnerable(true);&#10;        armorStand1.setNoGravity(true);&#10;        world.addFreshEntity(armorStand1);&#10;&#10;        // Create second Armor Stand at the second fence&#10;        ArmorStand armorStand2 = new ArmorStand(EntityType.ARMOR_STAND, world);&#10;        armorStand2.setPos(pos2.getX() + 0.5, pos2.getY() + 1, pos2.getZ() + 0.5);&#10;        armorStand2.setInvisible(true);&#10;        armorStand2.setInvulnerable(true);&#10;        armorStand2.setNoGravity(true);&#10;        world.addFreshEntity(armorStand2);&#10;&#10;        // Leash the armor stands together&#10;        armorStand1.setLeashedTo(armorStand2, true);&#10;    }&#10;}&#10;</field></block></next></block></xml>
